channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Event Manager -- WP Event Manager – Events Calendar, Registrations, Sell Tickets with WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Event Manager -- WP Event Manager – Events Calendar, Registrations, Sell Tickets with WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-49181|2023-12-15T14:49:51.927Z -- wp%20event%20manager -- wp%20event%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20registrations%2C%20sell%20tickets%20with%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Event Manager WP Event Manager – Events Calendar, Registrations, Sell Tickets with WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Event Manager – Events Calendar, Registrations, Sell Tickets with WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.1.40.

item.title: CVE-2023-47697|2023-11-13T22:28:41.379Z -- wp%20event%20manager -- wp%20event%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20registrations%2C%20sell%20tickets%20with%20woocommerce
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WP Event Manager WP Event Manager – Events Calendar, Registrations, Sell Tickets with WooCommerce plugin <= 3.1.39 versions.
